## Usage

Scan the following QR code:

![4b22ed0f29e0d26c](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44733677/222988399-edb16c38-c3d6-4dfd-a1d5-3bbd6d7a447c.jpeg)


Or open mona-cat://8cf6
